Installation
=====

unisolver Installation
------------

To use unisolver, first install it using pip:

.. code-block:: console

   (.venv) $ pip install unisolver

quadprog Installation
------------

To use quadprog, first install it using pip:

.. code-block:: console

   (.venv) $ pip install quadprog

Gurobi Installation
------------

To use Gurobi, first install it using pip:

.. code-block:: console

   (.venv) $ pip install Gurobi
